channel.title: Home for Sale - Pereybere - Mauritius
channel.description: Recent content on Home for Sale - Pereybere - Mauritius

item.title: Contact
item.description: Feel free to drop us a line if you want to arrange a visit, or would like to know more information. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message

item.title: Details
item.description: Ground Floor Terrace, leading to living space and dining area. Adjoining is a large room with potential e.g. as a home cinema, library or conversion to a bedroom. Corridor provides access to Kitchen and Utility room with adjoining shower and W/C. Internal door to Garage. Driveway plus roadside parking. First Floor Verandah with views to the South and of sunrise throughout the year. Great entry point for prevailing trade winds into the property.
